msbt.message: Almost time to leave this island When I think of all the friends I've made here, I, like This is SO not like me! I need to rehearse saying goodbye without crying!
I'm going to be super busy tomorrow prepping for the big move, so I'm on the relax train today.Just going to think about my time on and all the fun I'll have on my new island home!
I hope you, like, don't stop loving this island just because I'm in the wind, . HA! Guess I won't be able to joke around with you like this soon, huh?! Living on has totes been A BLASTthanks to you!
